response.overview: Malaria, a potentially deadly disease that's most often associated with the mosquito and characterized by high fevers, chills and flulike symptoms, claims more than 1 million innocent lives each year -- and the death toll keeps climbing. This fascinating documentary program profiles an array of people who are fighting their own battles with malaria, delivering an up-to-date status on the disease's global grip.
response.title: Malaria: Fever Wars
